-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.driver
(
    did integer NOT NULL,
    email character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    dlocation point,
    driverlicense character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    phone character varying(15) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    status character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    password integer,
    CONSTRAINT driver_pkey PRIMARY KEY (did)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.driverrespond
(
    did integer NOT NULL,
    tid integer NOT NULL,
    respond character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT driverrespond_pkey PRIMARY KEY (did, tid)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.favlocation
(
    lid integer NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    coordinates point NOT NULL,
    rid integer,
    CONSTRAINT favlocation_pkey PRIMARY KEY (lid)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.rider
(
    rid integer NOT NULL,
    email character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    phone character varying(15) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    status character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    password integer,
    CONSTRAINT rider_pkey PRIMARY KEY (rid)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.surgearea
(
    sid integer NOT NULL,
    zone polygon NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    multiplier integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT surgearea_pkey PRIMARY KEY (sid)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.trip
(
    tid integer NOT NULL,
    dropoff point,
    distance integer,
    pickup point,
    price integer,
    tripsstatus character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    starttime time without time zone,
    endtime time without time zone,
    routetaken character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    rideduration time without time zone,
    did integer,
    rid integer,
    CONSTRAINT trip_pkey PRIMARY KEY (tid)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.vehicle
(
    platenumber character varying(20) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    model character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    brand character(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    vid integer,
    did integer,
    CONSTRAINT vehicle_pkey PRIMARY KEY (platenumber)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.vehicletype
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    type character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    multiplier integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT vehicletype_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.driverrespond
    ADD CONSTRAINT driverrespond_did_fkey FOREIGN KEY (did)
    REFERENCES public.driver (did) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.driverrespond
    ADD CONSTRAINT driverrespond_tid_fkey FOREIGN KEY (tid)
    REFERENCES public.trip (tid) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.favlocation
    ADD CONSTRAINT favlocation_rid_fkey FOREIGN KEY (rid)
    REFERENCES public.rider (rid) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.trip
    ADD CONSTRAINT trip_did_fkey FOREIGN KEY (did)
    REFERENCES public.driver (did) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.trip
    ADD CONSTRAINT trip_rid_fkey FOREIGN KEY (rid)
    REFERENCES public.rider (rid) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.vehicle
    ADD CONSTRAINT vehicle_did_fkey FOREIGN KEY (did)
    REFERENCES public.driver (did) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.vehicle
    ADD CONSTRAINT vehicle_vid_fkey FOREIGN KEY (vid)
    REFERENCES public.vehicletype (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE CASCADE;

END;
